{{ddcl|since=c++26|
constexpr const char* name() const noexcept;
}}

Returns the primary name of {{c|*this}}. Equivalent to {{box|{{c/core|return}}{{nbspt|1}}{{rlpsi|/#name_}}{{c/core|;}}}}.

Accessing elements of {{rlpsi|/#name_}} outside of the range {{range|name()|name() + std::strlen(name()) + 1}} is undefined behavior.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
Primary name {{rlpsi|/#name_}} that is represented by a null-terminated byte string.
